description: '''The Hot Sardines''' is an American [[jazz]] band formed in [[New York City]] in 2007 by artistic director, singer, and writer Elizabeth Bougerol and artistic director, actor and pianist Evan Palazzo.{{sfn|BroadwayWorld|2014}} The Sardines emphasize both authenticity and irreverence in their performances.{{sfn|BroadwayWorld|2014}}
